Pre-Game Insights: India are touring Zimbabwe for a five-game T20I series, starting from Saturday, July 6.
Shubman Gill has been handed the responsibility of leading the Indian side.
The Indian players who had done well in the Indian Premier League 2024 have been given an opportunity to represent their nation.
Zimbabwe will be led by Sikandar Raza.
Zimbabwe's last international assignment came back in May when they faced Bangladesh in a five-match T20I series.
Zimbabwe have announced a well-balanced squad to face India.
The pitch at the Harare Sports Club is generally a good one to bat on.
Clear skies will greet the two sides on Saturday. The temperature is expected to range between 12 and 26 degrees Celsius.
Both sides will be eager to bring out their A-game and start the series on a winning note. India have all the bases covered and are a strong unit. They are expected to come out on top.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe and India have faced each other eight times in the shortest format. India have won six of those meetings whereas Zimbabwe have emerged victorious on two occasions.
